verses.verse: Who has <S%H539>believed<s%> our <S%H8052>message?<s%> To whom has the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> been <S%H1540>revealed?<s%>

For he grew <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him as a tender <S%H3126>plant,<s%> and as a <S%H8328>root<s%> out of <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>ground.<s%> He has no good <S%H8389>looks<s%> or <S%H1926>majesty.<s%> When we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4758>him,<s%> there is no beauty that we should desire <S%H2530>him.<s%>

He was <S%H959>despised,<s%> and <S%H2310>rejected<s%> by <S%H376>men;<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4341>suffering,<s%> and <S%H3045>acquainted<s%> with <S%H2483>disease.<s%> He was <S%H959>despised<s%> <S%H4564>as<s%> one from whom men hide their <S%H6440>face;<s%> and we <S%H2803>didn't<s%> respect him.

<S%H403>Surely<s%> he has <S%H5375>borne<s%> our <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and <S%H5445>carried<s%> our <S%H4341>suffering;<s%> yet we <S%H2803>considered<s%> him <S%H5060>plagued,<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> by <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>

But he was <S%H2490>pierced<s%> for our <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%> He was <S%H1792>crushed<s%> for our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%> The <S%H4148>punishment<s%> that brought our <S%H7965>peace<s%> was on <S%H2250>him;<s%> and by his wounds we are <S%H7495>healed.<s%>

All we like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> have gone <S%H8582>astray.<s%> <S%H376>Everyone<s%> has <S%H6437>turned<s%> to his own <S%H1870>way;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6293>laid<s%> on him the iniquity of us <S%H5771>all.<s%>

He was <S%H5065>oppressed,<s%> yet when he was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> he <S%H6605>didn't<s%> open his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> As a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> that is <S%H2986>led<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> and as a <S%H7353>sheep<s%> that <S%H6440>before<s%> its <S%H1494>shearers<s%> is <S%H481>mute,<s%> so he <S%H6605>didn't<s%> open his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

He was <S%H3947>taken<s%> away by <S%H6115>oppression<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and as for his <S%H1755>generation,<s%> who <S%H7878>considered<s%> that he was cut <S%H1504>off<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> and <S%H5061>stricken<s%> for the <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> of my <S%H5971>people?<s%>

They <S%H5414>made<s%> his <S%H6913>grave<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and with a <S%H6223>rich<s%> man in his <S%H4194>death;<s%> although he had <S%H6213>done<s%> no <S%H2555>violence,<s%> neither was any <S%H4820>deceit<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Yet it <S%H2654>pleased<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H1792>bruise<s%> <S%H2470>him.<s%> He has caused him to suffer. When you <S%H7760>make<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> an offering for <S%H817>sin,<s%> he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H2233>seed.<s%> He shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

After the <S%H5999>suffering<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> he will <S%H7200>see<s%> the light and be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%> My <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H6663>justify<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> by the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H5445>himself;<s%> and he will bear their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>

Therefore will I <S%H2505>divide<s%> him a portion with the <S%H7227>great,<s%> and he shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H6099>strong;<s%> because he poured <S%H6168>out<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> and was <S%H4487>numbered<s%> with the <S%H6586>transgressors;<s%> yet he <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H2399>sin<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> and made <S%H6293>intercession<s%> for the <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>
